mapper.insert: insert into calendar(title, start, end, allday, idNo) values(#{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{allDay}, #{idNo})
insert into calendar(title, start, end, allday, idNo, groupNo, CalendarType) values(#{title}, #{start}, #{end}, #{allDay}, #{idNo} ,#{groupNo}, 'group')
mapper.delete: delete from calendar where title=#{title} and start=#{start};
mapper.select: select title, start, end, allday, groupNo, Case When groupNo % 5 = 0 then '#FF0040' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 1 THEN '#01DFA5' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 2 THEN '#FE9A2E' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 3 THEN '#8000FF' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 4 THEN '#848484' Else '#000000' End As color from calendar where idNo=#{idNo}
select * from calendar where idNo=#{idNo} AND calendarType='individual'

select title, start, end, allday, groupNo, Case When groupNo % 5 = 0 then '#FF0040' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 1 THEN '#01DFA5' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 2 THEN '#FE9A2E' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 3 THEN '#8000FF' WHEN groupNo % 5 = 4 THEN '#848484' Else '#000000' End As color from calendar where groupNo=#{groupNo} AND calendarType='group'
mapper.update: update calendar set `start` = #{calendarDTO.start}, `end` = #{calendarDTO.end} where title=#{oldCalendarDTO.title} and `start`=#{oldCalendarDTO.start} and `end`=#{oldCalendarDTO.end}
mapper.select: select * from calendar where curdate() <= `start` and idNo= #{idNo} and CalendarType='individual' ORDER BY end
